summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 49th Street, from 15th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest; by widening pavement and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14632 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
